lyrics_en: Amazing grace! How sweet the sound / That saved a wretch like me! / I once was lost, but now am found; / Was blind, but now I see.
lyrics_yor: Ipe nla ni ayo kan / Ti o da mi si niwaju / Mo ti ri aiye mi pada / Mo ti n soro, mo ti n ri.

title_en: All Hail the Power of Jesus' Name
lyrics_en: All hail the power of Jesus' Name! / Let angels prostrate fall; / Bring forth the royal diadem, / And crown Him Lord of all.
lyrics_yor: Oriire Oluwa Jesu / Gb'orin eni t'eniyan ko le / T'oba ti l'ade t'o ju gbogbo / Oba awon oba lo.

lyrics_en: Great is Thy faithfulness, O God my Father; / There is no shadow of turning with Thee; / Thou changest not, Thy compassions, they fail not; / As Thou hast been, Thou forever will be.
lyrics_yor: Ewa ni b'olohun, Baba mi o / Ko si inu ombinrin l'odo Re / Ogo Re ti wa l'ola, ko si ibi ti o ntiyin / Bi o ti ba wa, O siju kan l'ojojumo.

lyrics_en: O Lord my God, when I in awesome wonder / Consider all the worlds Thy Hands have made; / I see the stars, I hear the rolling thunder, / Thy power throughout the universe displayed.
lyrics_yor: Ewa b'olohun pelu awon angeli / Ewa Re tobi, gbogbo ogo Re / Ti o npe fun wa l'ohun gbogbo ni / Ogo Re tobi ju gbogbo ogo.

lyrics_en: Holy, holy, holy! Lord God Almighty! / Early in the morning our song shall rise to Thee; / Holy, holy, holy, merciful and mighty! / God in three Persons, blessed Trinity!
lyrics_yor: Oluwa olorun mi, Ologo meta / L'aye alaye aye mi yio ma korin / Oluwa olorun mi, ologo meta.
